name: biketag-infra
title: BikeTag Infrastructure
description: Infrastructure code for devops of the BikeTag servers
author: Ken Eucker <keneucker@gmail.com>

scripts.server-reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.server-start: sudo pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production && npm run server-logs
scripts.server-restart: sudo pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js --env production && npm run server-logs
scripts.server-run: sudo pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production && npm run server-logs
scripts.server-rerun: sudo pm2 delete BikeTag && sudo pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production && npm run server-logs
scripts.server-deploy: npm run server-update && npm run server-restart && npm run server-logs
